sentences.sContent: Elaine turned her opalescent eyes on him.
sentences.sCn: 伊琳将乳白色的眼睛转向他。

sentences.sContent: ...a sky which was still faintly opalescent.

synos.tran: 乳白色的；[光]发乳白光的

words.tran: 蛋白石的，蛋白石状的；发乳光的；乳白色的
猫眼石，蛋白石；乳白玻璃
蛋白色光；[光] 乳白光
发出乳白色光，发乳白光

trans.tranOther: Opalescent means colourless or white like an opal, or changing colour like an opal
